example.text: JPMorgan may have turned a blind eye to the egregious abuse of Jeffrey Epstein, continuing what appears to be a lucrative relationship with him even after he was convicted of soliciting a minor and its own compliance officers raised alarms. The survivors deserve answers. [[url]]

Counselors are often the first person kids go to when they start experiencing mental health issues - we should be giving them the resources they need to do their jobs. The Bipartisan Safer Communities Act will help hire and support more mental health professionals in schools.

This is a big win for Minnesotans. Derailments are happening more and more often across the country, and we must act. We need to pass this legislation to get some common-sense safeguards put in place. [[url]]
Justice Alito, you’re a judge – not a doctor. Don’t try to make medical decisions for me or the people that I know. [[url]]
